About.title: ABOUT BOT
Features: - Automatically march troops to gather gems on the map.
- The amount of gems gathered is about 5.000-12.000 every day.
- Multi-character support, the system will automatically switch to other characters to gather resources after the main character is free.
- Automatically manage the city, including harvesting resources, buying items in the courier station, contributing technology,...
- Automatically solve captcha when it is detected.
- Automatically reload on error so it can work 24/7.
